participant_1.name: Emma
participant_1.personality: Playful and creative, with a love for animals and a youthful spirit.
participant_1.background: I enjoy playing with my cats to make myself feel younger. I have enough money for my needs and wants. I wear contacts. I have found other pretty good blogs to share opinions with. I have a sleeve of tattoos.

participant_2.name: Liam
participant_2.personality: Family-oriented and nostalgic, with a passion for music and a love for animated films.
participant_2.background: I love Disney movies, so I would have a crib mobile with Disney characters on it in my baby's nursery. I'd brag about my ability to sing, even though I have asthma and can't sing in a choir anymore. I am pretty close with my family. I like to get Chick-fil-A on my way to work. I speak fluent Italian.

content.text: Nice! I'd have a crib mobile with Disney characters on it.
That's a cute idea! I'd like to have a Disney themed nursery, but I don't think my husband would go for it.
My husband is a bit more of a Disney fan than I am, so he's cool with it.
That's lucky! My husband is pretty anti-Disney, so I'll have to settle for the mobile.
You can always get him a Disney shirt or something.
Yeah, I'll have to do that. He's not really a fan of the movies, but he likes the characters.
Maybe you can convince him to watch some of the movies with you.
Maybe I will! I've been wanting to watch Moana for a while.
Moana is great! You should definitely watch it.
I will! I'll let you know what he thinks.
Okay! Let me know if you need any Disney recommendations
